nodes.text: Sidoras Bey was a Human male who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. He once was a sculptor, and a portrait was made by Gungan artist Odoof Grunda depicting him sculpting a statue of Emperor Palpatine. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, Bey tasked a spacer with a number of assignments, including rescuing a child of his named Silaras Bey.

Sidoras Bey was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
